verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that , after weeks of negotiations , he and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un have agreed to meet in Singapore next month] .
President Donald Trump announced Thursday that , after weeks of negotiations , he and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: have] agreed to meet in Singapore next month .
President Donald Trump announced Thursday that , [ARGM-TMP: after weeks of negotiations] , [ARG0: he and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] have [V: agreed] [ARG1: to meet in Singapore next month] .

President Donald Trump announced Thursday that , after weeks of negotiations , [ARG0: he and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] have agreed to [V: meet] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: next month] .
